properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_NM = ?
UPDATE PROJECT SET OPEN_ST = ? WHERE PROJECT_NO = 5
UPDATE PROJECT SET PROJECT_INTRO = ? WHERE PROJECT_NO = 5
UPDATE PROJECT SET PROJECT_NM = ? WHERE PROJECT_NO = 5
SELECT PROJECT_NM, MEMBER_NICK, PROJECT_QUOTA, PROJECT_INTRO FROM PROJECT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE OPEN_ST = 'Y' ORDER BY PROJECT_NO DESC
